title: About
text: Hello my name is Jackson. I am a Sports Media and Communications major at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. I love sports and college basketball is my favorite thing on the planet.

title: Passing the Torch: How Jon Scheyer Is Sustaining Duke’s Standard
text:
Every now and again a college athletics programs are lucky enough to find the guy. On March 18th 1980 the Duke Blue Devils Men’s Basketball program did just that. They did this by hiring Head Coach Mike Kryzewski. Coach K as he was dubbed later in his coaching career took the Duke programs to levels only few programs will ever know. In his time at Duke Kryzewski would take the Blue Devils to 13 ACC Regular Season Titles, 15 ACC Tournament Titles, 13 Final Fours, and 5 National Championships including my favorite sports team of all time, the 2015 Duke Blue Devils MBB Team. Coach K achieved this feat due to many different factors including, but not limited to recruiting, efficiency, and especially in his last two decades the one-and-done player. In 2022 Coach K would retire leaving the legacy of Duke Men’s Basketball to former player and long time assistant Jon Scheyer. Scheyer so far has continued the success of Coach K’s final years and this is how he is doing it.


Code
ggplot(duke, aes(x = year, y = W.L., color = Coach)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.2) + geom_point(size = 3)

ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.
